description: Source file for the AppGateway plugin, containing implementation code related to the plugin's core functionality, responder logic, and module definitions.
external_methods: some external API methods implied by includes and typical plugin behavior

classes.name: Plugin::AppGateway
classes.description: Main plugin class implementing initialization, deinitialization, and core plugin logic.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Sets up the plugin, registers handlers, and allocates resources.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources and unregisters handlers during shutdown.

calls: some API functions for plugin registration and message handling
